htn_kidney.title: Short-Term Exposure to Air Pollution Increases Mortality From Hypertension and its Multiorgan Complications: A Case Crossover Study of 2.1 Million Deaths in China.
htn_kidney.journal: Journal of the American College of Cardiology
htn_kidney.authors: Xue X, Zhou Z, Luo H
htn_kidney.zhSummary: 该文聚焦高血压肾病，属于临床研究。核心观点：短期空气污染暴露是心血管事件的已知触发因素，但这种风险在高血压患者的不同进展阶段如何变化仍不清楚。 临床提示：本研究旨在量化与空气污染相关的不同进展阶段的高血压疾病造成的死亡风险和负担。
htn_kidney.abstract: Short-term air pollution exposure is a known trigger for cardiovascular events, yet how this risk varies across different progression stages of hypertensive patients remains unclear. This study sought to quantify the mortality risk and burden due to hypertensive diseases of different progression stages in association with air pollution. We conducted a nationwide, individual-level, time-stratified, case-crossover study including >2.1 million hypertension-related deaths across mainland China (2013-2019). portal_hypertension.title: Statin Therapy Independently Reduces Mortality and Liver Complications in Patients With Cirrhosis: An Updated Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.
portal_hypertension.authors: Moraes BF, Leite GAPD, Silveira IB
portal_hypertension.zhSummary: 该文聚焦门静脉高压症，属于综述研究（样本量约为 25）。核心观点：他汀类药物在肝硬化中的作用仍存在争议。 临床提示：历史上由于安全问题而受到限制，新的证据强调了潜在的多效性益处，尽管对死亡率和失代偿的影响仍不确定。
portal_hypertension.abstract: The role of statins in cirrhosis remains controversial. Historically restricted due to safety concerns, emerging evidence highlights potential pleiotropic benefits, though effects on mortality and decompensation remain uncertain. To evaluate the effects of statin therapy on all-cause mortality, hepatic decompensation, hepatic venous pressure gradient (HVPG), and hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) in cirrhosis. We systematically searched major databases until July 2025 for randomised controlled trials (RCTs) and observational studies comparing statin therapy versus non-use in cirrhosis. portal_hypertension.title: Indocyanine Green Clearance Correlates With Biomarkers Reflecting Key Disease-Driving Mechanisms in Advanced Chronic Liver Disease and Predicts Acute-on-Chronic Liver Failure and Death.
portal_hypertension.authors: Jachs M, Carvalho T, Simbrunner B
portal_hypertension.zhSummary: 该文聚焦门静脉高压症，属于临床研究。核心观点：通过静脉采样测定的吲哚菁绿 (ICG) 清除率在代偿性晚期慢性肝病 (cACLD) 的临床显着门静脉高压 (CSPH) 的诊断和失代偿性 ACLD 的预后方面显示出有希望的结果 临床提示：通过静脉采样测定的吲哚菁绿 (ICG) 清除率在代偿性晚期慢性肝病 (cACLD) 和临床显着性门脉高压 (CSPH) 的诊断中显示出有希望的结果。
portal_hypertension.abstract: Indocyanine green (ICG) clearance, determined by venous sampling, has shown promising results in the diagnosis of clinically significant portal hypertension (CSPH) in compensated advanced chronic liver disease (cACLD) and prognostication in decompensated ACLD (decompensated cirrhosis). Data on ICG clearance measurement by pulse dye densitometry (PDD) via finger clip are comparatively scarce. To evaluate the diagnostic (CSPH) and prognostic utility of ICG clearance throughout ACLD stages.
